item.title: Variety Announces Interview Studio Presented by Google TV at Comic-Con
item.description: Variety’s Interview Studio will return to San Diego Comic-Con on July 25–26, in partnership with Google TV. This year’s studio will showcase a series of in-depth interviews and discussions with leadin
